chapter.title: Specflow
chapter.p: This is a para. Line breaks are ignored within the para

section.title: Section
section.p: Make sure all the ids are unique.

section.title: Linking and footnotes
section.p: You can link to other items using an id .
You can add footnotes with embedded urls.
You can add footnotes with just text.Punctuation comes before the footnote according to Gojko

section.title: Embedding code
section.p: You can embed code, the code can be split into parts using comments
You can also put code inline

section.title: Images
section.p: You can embed images, put the image into the images directory under the root. Make sure the image has a unique id. We also found Gojko's environment is case sensitive whereas mine isn't for image file names (and probably yours won't be as well)
